abstract: Sen Marco Rubio has gone from distancing himself from comparisons to Pres Obama, who, like Rubio, was first-term senator when he ran for president, to embracing it as model for how he will advance conservative cause should he win White House.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubio suggested that Republicans should look at the president’s liberal accomplishments and hope for similar victories of the conservative kind with him in office.

headline.main: Marco Rubio Looks in the Mirror and Sees a Republican Obama
headline.print_headline: Rubio Looks in the Mirror and Sees the Republicans’ Obama, Up to a Point

snippet: Mr. Rubio suggested that Republicans should look at the president’s liberal accomplishments and hope for similar victories of the conservative kind with him in office.
